Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add live screenshot capture with hotkeys

Implemented F8/F9 hotkey system for real-time match capture:

- live_capture.py: Background listener for F8 \(match start\) and F9 \(match end\)
- Automatic timestamped screenshot saving
- Match duration tracking
- User-friendly console feedback

Workflow:
1. Run live_capture.py in background
2. Press F8 when match starts \(scoreboard visible\)
3. Press F9 when match ends
4. Use manual_match_entry.py to log the match
5. View stats with view_stats.py

Ready for live testing during actual gameplay!
